message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. We can negotiate from here.
You started with a fair offer, but I'm hoping to get a better deal now.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to keep a decent share for myself. Let's meet in the middle.
I'm not giving up yet. I think I can get a better deal.
I'm not backing down, Bob. I think this is a fair compromise.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about compromising, Alice. I'll try to make a stronger offer.
I'm not going to give you the majority of the money, Bob. I think this is a fair split, considering the inflation.
I'm not going to let you take advantage of me, Alice. I'm making a strong counteroffer.
This is my final offer, Bob. I think it's time to wrap up the negotiations.
I'm not going to let you walk away with most of the money, Alice. I'm making a last-ditch effort to get a better deal.
This is my last offer, Bob. I think it's time to accept or walk away.
I'm not going to accept such a lopsided deal, Alice. I'd rather walk away with nothing than give you 90% of the money.
